comments.en:
Dye-sublimation printer, 320dpi, 24bit color depth, max. paper size 3.5x5in/8x13cm. Does not print on normal paper, so it is not suitable for documents, it is only for photos.

USB and Parallel connection, memory card reader, TV output. Camera direct printing (Olympus only).

Consumables/Refills: Packs with special paper and three-color ribbon
